game.name: Fresh Start Cleaning Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Fresh Start is a relaxing single player game, in which you embark on a mission to clean up the world and restore nature to its fresh and colorful shape. Watch as the world changes in front of your eyes as you help animals, solve puzzles and grow plants around you.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fresh Start is a relaxing single player game, in which you embark on a mission to clean up the world and restore nature to its fresh and colorful shape. Watch as the world changes in front of your eyes as you help animals, solve puzzles and grow plants around you.

reviewHighlights.text: TLDR: Abandoned reboot of No Place Like Home A copy-and-paste of No Place Like Home by the same developers, with the same engine and most of the same...
I absolutely LOVED this game, However I had so many issues with it, it took me 3 times longer to complete. Persistent saving and crashing. But I don't...
